refund.title: Refund through Mollie
refund.content: Fill out the quantity of this item ({refundableQuantity} out of {quantity} left to refund) to be refunded to the customer.
refund.success: A refund has been created in Mollie. It may take 2 hours for the refund to complete. Until this time, you can cancel the refund in your Mollie Dashboard.
refund.error: Something went wrong creating a refund.

status-description.queued: The refund is queued until there is enough balance to process te refund. You can still cancel the refund.
status-description.pending: The refund will be sent to the bank on the next business day. You can still cancel the refund.
status-description.processing: The refund has been sent to the bank. The refund amount will be transferred to the consumer account as soon as possible.
status-description.refunded: The refund amount has been transferred to the consumer.
status-description.failed: The refund has failed after processing. For example, the customer has closed his / her bank account. The funds will be returned to your account.

shipping.title: Ship an order line item through Mollie
shipping.content: Fill out the quantity of this item ({shippableQuantity} out of {quantity} left to ship) to be shipped to the customer.

detailExtended.totalRemainingHelpText: You can refund up to â‚¬ 25 extra with Mollie.
